caption.p:
Skygrid plots for the different clusters. Phylodynamic analyses of HIV-1 pol gene for subtype G and CRF02_AG isolated in Nigeria. Bayesian Skygrid plots representing the changes in the effective population size of the virus ( N
e ) over time. The solid lines represent the estimated median log effective population size and the colour-coded shaded areas represent the 95%HPD intervals for the different clusters circulating in Nigeria. The gray-shaded area starts at the period when ART was introduced in Nigeria.
